description: Enterprise techniques mitigated by Environment Variable Permissions, ATT&CK mitigation M1039 (v1.1)
name: Environment Variable Permissions (M1039)

techniques.comment: Prevent users from changing the HISTCONTROL, HISTFILE, and HISTFILESIZE environment variables. (Citation: Securing bash history)
Making the environment variables associated with command history read only may ensure that the history is preserved.(Citation: Securing bash history)
